algorithm_technique: Iterate through the array and check adjacent elements or elements two positions apart for the repeated element.
problem_summary_simple: Find the element that appears N times in an array of size 2N.
problem_summary_technical: Leverages the property that the repeated element must appear adjacently or with one element in between due to its high frequency.
key_insights: The problem guarantees that exactly one element is repeated N times in an array of size 2N, with N+1 unique elements.
The repeated element must appear at least once in any pair of adjacent elements or elements separated by one element.
This observation allows for a simple O(n) time and O(1) space solution by checking these specific pairs.
